pages.text: The $(item)Heat Sink/$ is a block used to get rid of $(l:base_concepts/heat)Heat/$.$(p)Be careful, a $(item)Heat Sink/$ hotter than 60°C or colder than -60°C will hurt you when touched!$(p)$(item)Heat Sinks/$ only dissipate heat from the block they're directly connected to. To connect up many $(item)Heat Sinks/$, use $(l:machines/heat_pipe)Heat Pipes/$ to provide more surfaces.
$(italic)附著有多個散熱片的$(l:compressors/advanced_liquid_compressor)高級流體壓縮機/$

pages.title: 主動散熱
pages.text: 可以透過將$(item)散熱片/$放置在$(l:tubes/air_grate_module#active_cooling)空氣柵管道模組/$的工作範圍內提高其散熱效率。模組的工作範圍在將其安裝到$(l:tubes/pressure_tubes)壓力管道/$上時顯示。空氣柵管道模組的冷卻加成可以疊加。
